title: Drawing, "Design for a Vase", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink on cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink: lower left: Vase (underlined); at lower right: acier inoxydable [stainless steel].
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Flaring body raised on a narrow cylindrical base decorated with what seems to be three discs ending in a cylindrical foot.
